pages.text: If you got a $(item)Dirt Block$() whenever you mined an ore and it fell right into $(item)Lava$(), you'd have a whole lot of $(item)Dirt$().$(br)No idea what you would do with that much $(item)Dirt$(). Maybe give it to a friend who has just arrived here and needs shelter on his first night?$(br)Anyway, the dropping stuff into $(item)Lava$() thing has to stop. Oh yeah, Lava! Same with every $(item)Ghast Tear$() dropping into it, too.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Puts broken blocks and mob drops directly into your inventory instead of dropping them onto the ground.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools, shears, weapons, bows, crossbows, tridents and Spectrum's fishing rods.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Inventory Insertion by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.
